content: snake fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 14 assembly step 1 sew the 4 legs to the four feet position the leg perpendicular to the foot at the top between row 1 and 3 the side of the foot with the slip stitches should be on top sew the one foot with yarn color c to a front leg step 2 sew bandage 1 and 2 around the body temporarily pin the eyes in place and mark where the mouth will go between row 8-10 wrap the bandage around these features try and place the start and end of the bandages to the back of the head where they will be covered by the crown step 3 sew bandage 4 around the front leg with the foot in yarn color c sew bandage 3 around one of the back legs make sure that it can fold in half fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 15 step 4 stitch the front legs to the body using yarn color a i like to have the body at an angle forward it looks more froglike and gives a bigger spot on the head for the hat sew the front legs between row 11 and 20 3 stitches apart step 5 stitch the back legs to the body using yarn color a position the top part of the leg above row 22 bend the leg so that the foot is also above row 22 equally spaced apart from the front legs they sit lower than the front feet which is needed for the body to tilt forward sew only the top 3 and bottom 3 row of the legs to the body so that the middle part can stick out a little bit step 6 secure the eyeballs into the eyelids using the long tail make sure the safety eye is in the center now stitch the eyes to the body position them on either side of row 2 on the body fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 16 step 7 embroider a little mouth between row 8-10 at a diagonal line across two stitches using yarn color c step 8 place the upper egypt crown inside the lower egypt crown and sew together the bottom row using the long tail in yarn color d lightly stuff the crown and then sew it to the back of the head directly behind the eyes sew the snake to the front of the crown using the yarn tail only sew the snake to the bottom row of the crown now bend the snake into a s-shape fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 17 the end your fabulous freddie is now complete and i hope he brings you lots of joy you are welcome to sell completed toys but please give credit for the design to acanthus
